verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Turn your face to the King.
Let Him hear your heart sing.
Open your life to the joy He brings.
He is your everything, He is your everything.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
By your side He stands.
Jesus, God and man.
Don’t be afraid of the Great I AM.
Just let Him take your hand, just let Him take your hand.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Unquenchable fire, immeasurable love.
From glory to glory, flows from above.
Fountains of mercy, rivers of grace.
Come let us bathe in this holy place.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Never-ending joy, never-ending love,
Never-ending hope when you’re washed in the Blood.
Never-ending peace and eternal life.
God has the victory, the victory…
God has the victory, the victory…
